snippet: After last year’s earthquake-induced nuclear meltdown at the Fukushima Daiichi plant in Japan, PG&E, under public pressure, announced that it was committed to monitoring seismic activity.
lead_paragraph: After last year’s earthquake-induced nuclear meltdown at the Fukushima Daiichi plant in Japan, PG&E, under public pressure, announced that it was committed to monitoring seismic activity.

headline.seo: Plan to Track Quake Threat Near Diablo Canyon Is Questioned
headline.main: Plan to Track Quake Threat Is Questioned
headline.print_headline: Plan to Track Quake Threat Is Questioned
